com.aylanetworks.aylasdk

类 AylaLoginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaLoginManager

  • public class AylaLoginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for all API operations when the user is not signed in. These tasks include:
    • Sign-in with username / password
    • SSO sign-in
    • Facebook / Google sign-in
    • Password reset
    • Re-send email confirmation

    • 方法概要

      Confirms the users email address by validating the token received in email in response to a sign-up request initiated by signUp(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaUser, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaEmailTemplate, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaUser>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener).

    • 方法详细资料

      • signIn

        public void signIn(AylaAuthProvider authProvider,
                   java.lang.String sessionName,
                   com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAuthorization> successListener,
                   ErrorListener errorListener)
        Signs in the user with the given AylaAuthProvider. When complete, the successResponse listener will be called if successful with the AylaAuthorization object of the logged-in user. Errors will cause the errorListener to be called with an AylaError result indicating the cause of the failure.
        参数:
        authProvider - Provider to perform the sign-in operation
        sessionName - Name for this session. If a session with this name already exists, the existing session will be closed before opening this one
        successListener - Listener to receive the AylaUser object on login success
        errorListener - Listener to receive an AylaError in case of failures

      • signUp

        public AylaAPIRequest signUp(AylaUser userInfo,
                             AylaEmailTemplate template,
                             com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaUser> successListener,
                             ErrorListener errorListener)
        Creates an account on the Ayla service using the supplied AylaUser. The AylaUser object should contain all of the fields that should be set in the new account. Required fields are: email password firstname lastname country
        参数:
        userInfo - Object containing the user information for the new account
        template - An optional template object to configure the welcome email sent to the new user
        successListener - Listener to receive the new AylaUser after creation
        errorListener - Listener to receive an error should one occur
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest object for this request

      • resendConfirmationEmail

        public AylaAPIRequest resendConfirmationEmail(java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                              AylaEmailTemplate template,
                                              com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                              ErrorListener errorListener)
        Notifies the service to re-send the confirmation email that was sent when the account was first created. If successful, the service will send an email to the specified email address using the template provided, or the default template if none was specified.
        参数:
        emailAddress - The email address of the account to re-send the confirmation for
        template - Optional email template information, may be null
        successListener - Listener called with an EmptyResponse on success
        errorListener - Listener called with an AyalError on failure
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest for this call, which may be canceled.

      • requestPasswordReset

        public AylaAPIRequest requestPasswordReset(java.lang.String email,
                                           AylaEmailTemplate template,
                                           com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                           ErrorListener errorListener)
        Requests a password reset on the service for the specified email address. The service will send the specified email address an email with a link to reset the password. The details of the email may be specified via the template argument. If this argument is null, the default email template will be used.
        参数:
        email - Email address of the account to have the password reset
        template - Email template, optional, may be null
        successListener - Listener called if the request was successful
        errorListener - Listener called if an error occurred
        返回:
        an AylaAPIRequest object which may be used to cancel the request

      • resetPassword

        public AylaAPIRequest resetPassword(java.lang.String newPassword,
                                    java.lang.String token,
                                    com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                    ErrorListener errorListener)
        Performs a password reset for the user after the user has received the reset token from the Ayla Cloud Service.
        参数:
        newPassword - New password for the account
        token - Token received in email after calling requestPasswordReset(java.lang.String, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaEmailTemplate, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener)
        successListener - Listener called if the operation is successful
        errorListener - Error listener called if an error was encountered
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest for this request, which may be canceled

      • confirmSignUp

        public AylaAPIRequest confirmSignUp(java.lang.String token,
                                    com.android.volley.Response.Listener<AylaAPIRequest.EmptyResponse> successListener,
                                    ErrorListener errorListener)
        Confirms the users email address by validating the token received in email in response to a sign-up request initiated by signUp(com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaUser, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaEmailTemplate, com.android.volley.Response.Listener<com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.AylaUser>, com.aylanetworks.aylasdk.error.ErrorListener). Once this API returns success, the user account has been confirmed and the user may sign in.
        参数:
        token - Token received in the user's email after signing up
        successListener - Listener called if the operation is successful
        errorListener - Listener called if an error occurred
        返回:
        the AylaAPIRequest for this operation, which may be canceled

      • userServiceUrl

        public java.lang.String userServiceUrl(java.lang.String path)
        Returns a URL for the User service pointing to the specified path. This URL will vary depending on the AylaSystemSettings provided to the CoreManager during initialization.
        参数:
        path - Path of the URL to be returned, e.g. "users/sign_in.json"
        返回:
        Full URL, e.g. "https://ads-field.aylanetworks.com/apiv1/users/sign_in.json"

      • sendUserServiceRequest

        public AylaAPIRequest sendUserServiceRequest(AylaAPIRequest request)
        Enqueues the provided request to the Ayla Cloud User Service.
        参数:
        request - the request to send
        返回:
        the request, which can be used for cancellation.
